extendedInfo.description: The Home Office Warrior Workout is a dynamic, 7 day workout video series showing you a wide range of exercises that you can do from the comfort of your own home. Get an entire full body workout designed by a popular personal trainer who has worked with hundreds of people to design healthier bodies and lifestyles. â¢ Day 1 â LEG BLAST Duration: 9:51 â¢ DAY 2 - UPPER BODY Duration: 10:47 â¢ DAY 3 - CARDIO BLAST Duration: 9:44 â¢ DAY 4 - DYNAMIC UPPER BODY WORKOUT Duration: 9:44 â¢ DAY 5 - DYNAMIC LOWER BODY WORKOUT Duration: 12:14 â¢ DAY 6 - CORE WORKOUT Duration: 8:39 â¢ DAY 7 - ISOMETRIC WORKOUT AND STRETCHING Duration: 16:21 Total Running Time: 1 hour,17 mins, 24 secs***** Requirements and Features *****â¢ Only compatible with android devices that can support 640x480 video playback.â¢ Internet connection required to download videos. (WiFi connection recommended.)â¢ Total space required to download all videos is 378MB.â¢ Each video will be downloaded automatically from high performance Amazon CloudFront servers when viewed for the first time.â¢ Videos will be stored on SD card first if available, otherwise they will be stored in internal memory.â¢ An alert message will be displayed if there is insufficient external or internal data storage available to download a video.*********************************************
